src:
MONCLER天才計畫開限時店　10款特別版T-Shirt不到8000元
07 Nov 2019, 11:08 by 陳慧明
盟可睞（MONCLER）自本月7日起至12月15日，在台北信義新光三越A9開設MONCLER Genius台灣限時概念店，此概念店匯集總共7個MONCLER Genius合作系列，不但是品牌於台灣設立的首家限時概念店，也同時為亞太區的首站。
MONCLER Genius（天才計劃）是一個多元的創意項目，自2018年6月起開始，至今已經到了第三季。通過跟世界各地的創作單位合作，品牌每月發布一個或多個系列，這一季旗下的10個系列中會有7個系列聚集在台灣限時概念店中，包括0 MONCLER Richard Quinn、2 MONCLER 1952、3 MONCLER Grenoble、4 MONCLER Simone Rocha、7 MONCLER Fragment Hiroshi Fujiwara、8 MONCLER Palm Angels及MONCLER Poldo Dog Couture。


MONCLER Genius台灣限時概念店中聚集了七個系列。（盟可睞提供）

天才計劃的目的是致力於創造與創新，讓限時概念店成為一個激發靈感的空間。本次限時概念店推出多款Moncler Genius限定商品，以及由7個系列中的11位天才設計師專為限時概念店所設計的10款特別版T-Shirt，會在店內獨家發售。








更新時間｜2019.11.07 11:06
text:
MONCLER genius plan opening time shop 10 special edition T-Shirt less than 8,000 yuan
07 Nov 2019, 11:08 by Chen Huiming
Since the 7th of this month to December 15th, MONCLER has opened the MONCLER Genius Taiwan Time-Limited Concept Store at A9, Shin Kong Mitsukoshi, Taipei. This concept store brings together a total of 7 MONCLER Genius cooperation series, not only the brand is established in Taiwan. The first limited-time concept store is also the first stop in the Asia Pacific region.
MONCLER Genius is a diverse creative project that began in June 2018 and has reached its third season. By working with creative agencies around the world, the brand publishes one or more series each month. Seven of the 10 series in this season will be gathered in Taiwan's limited-time concept store, including 0 MONCLER Richard Quinn, 2 MONCLER 1952, 3 MONCLER Grenoble, 4 MONCLER Simone Rocha, 7 MONCLER Fragment Hiroshi Fujiwara, 8 MONCLER Palm Angels and MONCLER Poldo Dog Couture.


The MONCLER Genius Taiwan limited-time concept store has seven collections. (Allies can offer)

The purpose of the Genius Project is to create and innovate, making the time-limited concept store a space for inspiration. This limited-time concept store offers a variety of Moncler Genius limited items, as well as 10 special editions of T-Shirt designed by 11 talented designers from 7 series for limited-time concept stores, which will be exclusively available in the store.








Update time|2019.11.07 11:06
